sentences.sentence: I am so angry, whapping he back, a hard power whap, good whap! See the expression on his face?
sentences.translation: 我非常生气，狠狠地扇了回去， 重重的一巴掌，打得好！看见他脸上的表情没？

sentences.sentence: Adan : I am so angry whapping he back, a hard power whap, good whap! See the expression on Lego's face?
sentences.translation: 阿丹：我非常生气，重重的回巴他的脸回去， 啪搭一声，看见臭高脸上的表情没？
